attributes.action: Stop CSA deductions for parents with joint residency orders
attributes.additional_details:
We the below signed want to abolish child support payments to parents where there is a joint residency order in place and to remove the "resident parent" label so both parents have the ability to claim for benefits there child is entitled too.

The current scheme favours only one parent and can cause severe financial hardship for the "non resident parent" especially where no agreement can be reached.

This situation needs to be changed so separated/divorced parents that have a joint residency order and both play an active part in the child's life have equal rights under the law and puts an end to the "non resident" parent been discriminated against.

Thank you for taking the time for reading and signing the petition
